Fable [i](You may trigger the chapters of this saga in any order. You choose which chapter to use as you place lore counters on it.)[/i]
I – The next time an opponent casts a spell, counter it.
II – Return each multicolored card without fable from your graveyard to your hand.
III – The next time you cast a multicolored spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
